user.title: EV Tracker API Key
user.description: Enter your EV Tracker API key. You can generate one at evtracker.cz/settings/api-keys (requires PRO subscription).

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to EV Tracker API. Please check your internet connection.
error.invalid_api_key: Invalid API key. Please check your key or ensure you have a PRO subscription.
error.no_cars: No cars found in your account. Please add a car in EV Tracker first.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

init.title: EV Tracker Options
init.description: Configure update interval and tariff tracking.

tariff_schedule.title: Tariff Schedule
tariff_schedule.description: Configure up to 4 time windows. For tariffs like D25d with LOW periods at night, select 'Windows define LOW'. For tariffs like D45d with only a few HIGH peak hours, select 'Windows define HIGH' and enter those peak hours.

tariff_entity.title: Tariff Entity
tariff_entity.description: Select an existing entity that indicates LOW tariff (on = LOW tariff, off = HIGH tariff).

prices.title: Price Configuration
prices.description: Configure default prices for charging sessions. These will be used when logging sessions without specifying prices explicitly.

error.window1_required: At least one time window is required.
error.window_incomplete: Each window must have both start and end times.

log_session.name: Log charging session
log_session.description: Log a charging session with full control over all parameters.

energy_kwh.name: Energy consumed
energy_kwh.description: Amount of energy consumed in kWh.

car_id.name: Car ID
car_id.description: ID of the car (leave empty to use default car from config).

energy_source.name: Energy source
energy_source.description: Source of energy (GRID or SOLAR). Can be mapped from a solar production sensor.

rate_type.name: Tariff rate type
rate_type.description: Electricity tariff rate (HIGH or LOW) for dual-rate plans. HIGH = peak/daytime, LOW = off-peak/night.

log_session_simple.name: Log charging session (simple)
log_session_simple.description: Log a charging session with smart defaults from EV Tracker settings.
